title: Waćmierz
text:
Waćmierz () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Subkowy">Gmina Subkowy</a>, within <a href="Tczew%20County">Tczew County</a>, <a href="Pomeranian%20Voivodeship">Pomeranian Voivodeship</a>, in northern Poland. It lies approximately west of <a href="Subkowy">Subkowy</a>, south of <a href="Tczew">Tczew</a>, and south of the regional capital <a href="Gda%C5%84sk">Gdańsk</a>.
For details of the history of the region, see "<a href="History%20of%20Pomerania">History of Pomerania</a>".
The village has a population of 270.
References.
